programme.title: Uncut: Chisora v Fury
programme.desc: Dereck Chisora and Tyson Fury finally renew their rivalry in a heavyweight world title eliminator. And Billy Joe Saunders lays it all on the line against Chris Eubank Jr. The whole night uncut..(n)

programme.title: Ormond v Flanagan
programme.desc: Ireland's Stephen Ormond looks to extend his impressive run as WBO European Lightweight champion when he faces Terry Flanagan, holder of one of British boxing's best records at 26-0..(n)

programme.title: Uncut: Frampton v Parodi
programme.desc: Belfast's Odyssey was rocking as a packed house roared Carl Frampton to victory in his European Super-Bantamweight defence against Jeremy Parodi of France. The whole fight, the whole night, uncut..(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- Ricky Hatton was 28 fights undefeated going into his bout against Eamonn Magee. In front of 10,000 fans in Manchester, could he survive an early scare to retain his WBU crown?.(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- Anthony Farnell is on home turf in Manchester, with his second crack at a world title. This one is against South Africa's Ruben Groenewald for the WBU middleweight belt..(n)

programme.title: Uncut: Mayweather v Alvarez
programme.desc: Saturday 14th September 2013 the eyes of the sporting world focussed on Las Vegas to find out who would be 'The One' as Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Saul Alvarez met in the biggest fight for years.(n)
